title: Beshear touts education plan ahead of lawmakers reconvening
description: Gov. Andy Beshear says Kentucky is lagging behind in the “competition for talent” to lead its classrooms. He renewed his push Monday for higher teacher pay as a way to overcome a shortage of educators. He's asking lawmakers to award…
author: By BRUCE SCHREINER - Associated Press

title: Kentucky Gov. Beshear makes another appeal for education spending
description: Democratic Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear spoke on the state's teacher shortage Monday, and is expected to push the state legislature to increase education funding.
author: Associated Press

title: 'Border state problems' in Kentucky: Candidates attack Dem gov for state's response to fentanyl crisis
description: As Kentucky's gubernatorial race heats up, the drug crisis plaguing the state has taken center stage in the campaigns of each of the candidates hoping to unseat Democrat Gov. Andy Beshear.
author: Brandon Gillespie

title: Louisville juvenile detention center deemed unsafe set to reopen after repairs
description: A Louisville juvenile detention center that was deemed unsafe is set to reopen after weeks of repairs. The center has done repairs to the doors, locks, and fire alarm systems.
author: Associated Press

title: Eyes on 2024: GOP primary kicks off with Trump trips and sniping
description: Former President Trump visited New Hampshire and South Carolina this past weekend.
author: Ben Kamisar

title: Poll finds 71% of Americans believe country is on wrong track
description: 71% of Americans in a new NBC News poll say the country is headed in the wrong direction — the eighth time that level has been hit in the last nine NBC polls.
author: Chuck Todd
